title: Ellie Goulding marries Caspar Jopling in Yorkshire as guests Katy Perry, Princess Eugenie look on
text:
Ellie Goulding tied the knot with her longtime art dealer boyfriend, Caspar Jopling, Saturday in North Yorkshire, England, People reports.

Guests at the wedding included Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom, James Blunt and his wife, Sofia, actress Sienna Miller, Princess Eugenie and her husband, and Eugenie's mom, Sarah, Duchess of York, according to photos from the event.

Princess Eugenie has been credited with introducing the newlyweds.

As People reports, Goulding wore a long-sleeved white Chloé gown with a train and high-necked collar, as well as a veil and small earrings. She carried a white bouquet.

According to the BBC, Goulding arrived for the wedding at the historic York Minster cathedral -- one of the largest in Northern Europe -- in a blue Volkswagen camper van.

After the ceremony, according to published reports, the guests had a reception at Castle Howard, a huge stately home that was the setting for "Brideshead Revisited."

Goulding and Jopling have been dating since 2017; he works at Sotheby's New York and is the grandson of a baron. They announced their engagement in August 2018.

In June, Goulding told ABC Radio, "I'm gonna be a married woman soon, which is quite scary. But you know, it's all very natural, it doesn't feel like anything's out of place in my life and I feel like it's all in the right place, and it's great!"

Danny Lawson/PA via AP
description: Ellie Goulding married Caspar Jopling in Yorkshire as guests like Katy Perry and Princess Eugenie looked on.
